text: Laylat al-Qadr () (also known as Shab-e-Qadr), basically the Night of Decree or Night of Measures, is the anniversary of two very important dates in Islam. They occurred in the month of Ramadan. It is the anniversary of the night Muslims believe the first verses of the Qur'an were revealed to the Islamic prophet Muhammad. == References == ==Other websites== *An old book from 1683 that talks about the Night of Destiny Category:Islamic calendar Category:Arabic words and phrases
title: Qadr Night
